archimate:Requirement.name: SI-13(4): Predictable Failure Prevention | Standby Component Installation and Notification
archimate:Requirement.documentation: If system component failures are detected: (a) Ensure that the standby components are successfully and transparently installed within [Assignment: organization-defined time period]; and (b) [Selection (one or more): Activate [Assignment: organization-defined alarm]; Automatically shut down the system; [Assignment: organization-defined action]].

properties.value: Automatic or manual transfer of components from standby to active mode can occur upon the detection of component failures.
